867093601620287488.text: The FCC is back open to public comment on net neutrality. You can write in to support strong title two backing here: http://www.gofccyourself.com

798023175355310082.text: And to support journalism, subscribe to a newspaper and donate to ProPublica (http://propublica.org ).

798022829430059008.text: Another worthy cause is the Mexican American Legal Defense and Education Fund (http://maldef.org ).

798022690162573312.text: Give to the NAACP Legal Defense and Education Fund (http://naacpldf.org ) or the Trevor Project for LGBT youth (http://thetrevorproject.org ).

798022334389043204.text: If you don’t think refugees are a terrorist army in disguise give to the International Refugee Assistance Project (http://refugeerights.org ).

798022028326420480.text: If you don’t believe man-made global warming is a a silly issue, give to the Natural Resources Defense Council (http://nrdc.org ).

798021897367629824.text: To support women's health: Planned Parenthood (http://plannedparenthood.org ) or the Center for Reproductive Rights (http://reproductiverights.org ).

798021320810360832.text: If you can afford the time or money, here are some organizations that are worth supporting…

446823775372599296.text: The GOP idea of cool is a leather jacket that’s thinner than a condom and more effective as a means of contraception.pic.twitter.com/JZATApm37z

442016986034634753.text: Paul Ryan knows an old man who was forced to tie balloons to his house to move to an area w/ lower taxes after his wife died. #Ryanecdotes

441991858353602560.text: As a young orphan, Paul Ryan was once a chimney sweep whose friend Fagin was failed by a culture of entitlement and debt. #ryanecdotes

441253778742734848.text: For those interested, my new show @LastWeekTonight will air Sunday nights at 11 on HBO, and premiers April 27th #pleasepleasepleasewatch

440995204535836672.text: My tweets are like GNR's Chinese Democracy album - there's always an inexplicably long build up followed by crushing disappointment.

440604747569979392.text: The interim President of Ukraine looks like someone who is about to kidnap Liam Neeson's daughter again.pic.twitter.com/B8jofg8Moe

440604030302031873.text: What has eight fingers and just remembered his twitter password...(pointing eight fingers awkwardly towards face) #thisguy

399898777370128384.text: Thanks to @the_USO for taking me to Afghanistan this year, for some of the best and strangest gigs of my life.pic.twitter.com/H22kmcaXAg

399897864886681600.text: If you're looking for a veterans group to support, @TeamRubicon is doing great things. They're on their way to the Philippines right now.

399897042526294016.text: A heartfelt Happy Veterans Day to some of the smartest, funniest, bravest maniacs I have ever met.

397905516279517184.text: Latest Bugle podcast to fill both your ears and the void in your soul*...https://soundcloud.com/the-bugle/bugle-250-no-one-is-madder … (*void in soul filling not guaranteed)

393199606676197376.text: Do you live in Austin, Texas? Are you willing to move there for the sake of watching me do stand-up? I'm at Bass Concert Hall on friday.

393194495937761280.text: Community returns to NBC at 8pm on January 2nd! Spoiler alert - it's going to be very, very good.

389541454013427712.text: Anywhere else in the world, humans are around 60% water. In LA, they seem to be 20% avocado, and 80% bullshit #sciencefact

389111118603366400.text: I had great fun last night at the "turbo fancy" Chicago Theater. Minneapolis tonight. The "fancy bar" is high...pic.twitter.com/iAS0n3creN

389108590344024064.text: I got to record a voice for The Simpsons last week. I know - I can't believe it either.http://tvline.com/2013/10/04/exclusive-the-simpsons-targets-daily-shows-john-oliver-to-play-wilkes-john-booth/ …

385570217008435200.text: Congress has a 10% approval rating; apparently lower than colonoscopies. Both deal with assholes; only one serves a practical function.

384508466447917057.text: Look out ladies, bartenders, and any sense of human decency...Duncan is back #communitypic.twitter.com/O9sfzpmNUq

379401258995437569.text: New York sidewalk saying..."Find A Penny, Pick It Up. All Day Long You'll Have Hepatitis."

378542637919117313.text: There will, however, be @JoeMande, @TheJamieLee and @wkamaubell. So, that's even better.

378540975611604992.text: 11pm tonight - the Season Finale of my stand-up show. There will be singing! Dancing! Acrobats! There will be none of those things.

377993750967906304.text: I loved the De Blasio family "victory dance". The "De Blasio 4" are like the "Jackson 5", but with one less person and better parenting.

366583466814484483.text: We have @SenRandPaul, @JoshuaOppenheim, Regis Philbin, and @simonpegg. Also, @Oprah, if she wants.

366581911373627392.text: Final guests include David Spade, http://Will.I.Am  and Sophia Grace & Rosie. Hold on; my mistake, they're all on Ellen.

366579638371233792.text: My last week of summer hosting starts tomorrow! It's your final chance to be justifiably disappointed that Jon Stewart isn't back yet.

366317564697120769.text: Bugle 244 available for your consumption - https://soundcloud.com/the-bugle  - features Edward Snowden AKA Sir Leaks-A-Lot.

366008923796418561.text: Russia's record in gay rights is about as good as it's record in non-potato based alcohol.

365987832923308032.text: Tonight's show at 11pm! @peteholmes, @jessirklein and @JAdomian. All for the low, low price of however much your cable package costs.

363334361724100608.text: Mugabe is the Harlem Globetrotters of democracy. His winning record is undeniably impressive, but he doesn't really play by the rules.

363332657490313216.text: 11pm tonight on your TV you can see @thomaslennon, @saraschaefer1, and @joezimmerman. The Swedes call that a smorgasbord of laughter.

360873038004240385.text: Tonight's guests are @reggiewatts, @ColinJost and @NicksTurners. All great comedians. All terrible people.

360870288033976320.text: What are you doing at 11pm tonight? Nothing? Perfect - my Comedy Central stand-up show is back. What's that? Something just came up? Hello?

356958291005407233.text: Oh, yes - which meant I had to sing the end credit music myself. I think I might have broken The Daily Show.

356957680704823297.text: You might want to watch The Daily Show tonight. We lost all of the power to our studio equipment before the interview with Aaron Sorkin.

346290846611685378.text: BREAKING SINCERITY ALERT: Thanks so much for the support regarding my strange summer job. We're back tomorrow with guest @lindacardellini

343841798189379584.text: Just to reassure everyone - The Daily Show is going to look exactly the same tomorrow...pic.twitter.com/W1JTZdXyir

343815472292184064.text: Letterman gave me some advice about interviewing actors. His last tip was both useful, and potentially disastrous http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xhMQvlhXSxU …

330016938585620480.text: I promise to increase our viewers in the "key demo" this summer. The "key demo" is stray cats watching through Best Buy windows, right?

330009893497090048.text: If you've always dreamed of watching me do stand-up in New Brunswick, this weekend is your big chance. Also, you should dream bigger.

329649109042618368.text: Part 3 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mVuspKSjfgA … - hope you like/ liked them/ like them again.

329648651716677633.text: Many thanks for your kind/ angry comments about our pieces on gun control last week. If you missed them - part one:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9pOiOhxujsE …

329645235913232384.text: And @THR are going to be very disappointed when they find out that I am not, in fact, Patrick Stewart in a wighttp://www.hollywoodreporter.com/live-feed/john-oliver-gets-daily-show-450197 …

329644118932324353.text: Don't worry, it'll still be everything you love about the Daily Show - just without the thing you love the most about it.

329643943815958528.text: Just so you know, from June 10th I'm going to be hosting the Daily Show for a couple of months, while Jon Stewart directs a movie.

310043684810944513.text: Whatever your opinion of Hugo Chavez, you have to agree on this - he had a commitment to the beret.

302508416851668993.text: Donald Trump should be the next Pope. The Catholic Church is the only organization that likes gold more than he does.

266228584253882368.text: The US made history last night. It's never cost so much money to not become President.

265824106807717888.text: If Mitt Romney wins the election tonight, the White House will be one of the smallest houses he's ever lived in.

256565281118355456.text: Children - better tell your parents to start lining up for the two least popular new toys this holiday season...pic.twitter.com/WPZqc8B7

242069094474608641.text: I'm now in Charlotte for the DNC. Apparently their surprise speaker on Thursday is going to be Gene Hackman arguing with a bean bag chair.

242058012938870784.text: The RNC 2012 will be remembered for so many things...as long every single one of those things are Clint Eastwood or chair related.

242057192449114112.text: Farewell to the RNC. Somehow fitting that it was held in Tampa - a physical and emotional swamp.

239568174704635904.text: Just finished an intensely competitive game of Strip Jenga with Prince Harry. Now missing a brick. Photos to follow.

238438654098411520.text: Sorry for the delay between tweets. Don't worry, I'm not trapped under something heavy. If you need proof, I'm on @jimmyfallon tonight.

228871405830275074.text: Episode 2 of my stand up show is on Comedy Central tonight @11. Don't worry, you don't need to have seen episode 1 for it to make sense.

228290989494792192.text: My latest interview with Herman Cain is on @TheDailyShow tonight. He's the greatest president you should be thankful America’s never had.

226458703761641472.text: This is my official account. To prove it's really me, here's a photo of my dog holding up today's newspaper.pic.twitter.com/rDPFsrix

226387723743809538.text: Congratulations to Viacom and Direct TV for reaching a peace agreement. Truly there is hope for Israel and Palestine.

226387533192368129.text: OK, I'm joining twitter. Just 6 years late to the party. Where are the snacks?

218031319739936769.text: All the latest live dates are now listed on http://www.iamjohnoliver.com/?page_id=9
